price: Nítorí náà, Mó fi Olúwa sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ búra, dájúdájú òdodo ni (ọ̀rọ̀ náà) gẹ́gẹ́ bí ó ṣe jẹ́ òdodo pé ẹ̀ ń fẹnu sọ̀rọ̀.
arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fawarabbi al-samāi wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mith'la mā annakum tanṭiqūna
